Trinity::
She giggled and kept running after the butterfly.  She ran furhter 
away and didnt even notice.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     As he finishes his sentence he looks for Trinity.  He looks 
frantically 
> around unable to find her.
> 
> ::Wolveritron::
>     "Relax she went that way."  He points in the direction of 
Trinity and 
> watches as Aerotaur runs off after her.
